channel.title: CVE Feed for ICS-CERT -- CX-Supervisor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ICS-CERT -- CX-Supervisor

item.title: CVE-2018-19017|2024-09-17T01:00:42.376Z -- ics-cert -- cx-supervisor
item.description: Several use after free vulnerabilities have been identified in CX-Supervisor (Versions 3.42 and prior). When processing project files, the application fails to check if it is referencing freed memory. An attacker could use a specially crafted project file to exploit and execute code under the privileges of the application.

item.title: CVE-2018-19020|2024-09-17T03:27:41.239Z -- ics-cert -- cx-supervisor
item.description: When CX-Supervisor (Versions 3.42 and prior) processes project files and tampers with the value of an offset, an attacker can force the application to read a value outside of an array.

item.title: CVE-2018-19019|2024-09-17T01:16:24.999Z -- ics-cert -- cx-supervisor
item.description: A type confusion vulnerability exists when processing project files in CX-Supervisor (Versions 3.42 and prior). An attacker could use a specially crafted project file to exploit and execute code under the privileges of the application.
